name: Super Pac
description:
Super Pac is the arcade game you know and love, but bigger and better than ever before! Join billions of fans over the world and compete in Tournaments, earn achievements, and win bragging rights at the top of the scoresheet
***How to play the game:
The player to adjust the arrow so that the food is from 1 to 3 stars and finally to split it across all the key. Each level has a point on the press published several star that players to wield the arrows so that reasonable arrangements to achieve 3 stars. Ending the path on the screen, so supper pac will run back along the old path.
